org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

类 HRegionServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.HasThread
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.HRegionServer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Runnable, Abortable, ConfigurationObserver, FavoredNodesForRegion, LastSequenceId, MutableOnlineRegions, OnlineRegions, RegionServerServices, Server, Stoppable
    直接已知子类:
    HMaster

    @InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate(value="Tools")
public class HRegionServer
extends HasThread
implements RegionServerServices, LastSequenceId, ConfigurationObserver
    HRegionServer makes a set of HRegions available to clients. It checks in with the HMaster. There are many HRegionServers in a single HBase deployment.

    • 字段详细资料

      • TEST_SKIP_REPORTING_TRANSITION

        public static boolean TEST_SKIP_REPORTING_TRANSITION
        For testing only! Set to true to skip notifying region assignment to master .

      • regionsInTransitionInRS

        protected final ConcurrentMap<byte[],Boolean> regionsInTransitionInRS

      • cacheFlusher

        protected org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.MemStoreFlusher cacheFlusher

      • hMemManager

        protected HeapMemoryManager hMemManager

      • clusterConnection

        protected ClusterConnection clusterConnection
        Cluster connection to be shared by services. Initialized at server startup and closed when server shuts down. Clients must never close it explicitly. Clients hosted by this Server should make use of this clusterConnection rather than create their own; if they create their own, there is no way for the hosting server to shutdown ongoing client RPCs.

      • metaTableLocator

        protected MetaTableLocator metaTableLocator

      • compactSplitThread

        public CompactSplit compactSplitThread

      • onlineRegions

        protected final Map<String,HRegion> onlineRegions
        Map of regions currently being served by this region server. Key is the encoded region name. All access should be synchronized.

      • regionFavoredNodesMap

        protected final Map<String,InetSocketAddress[]> regionFavoredNodesMap
        Map of encoded region names to the DataNode locations they should be hosted on We store the value as InetSocketAddress since this is used only in HDFS API (create() that takes favored nodes as hints for placing file blocks). We could have used ServerName here as the value class, but we'd need to convert it to InetSocketAddress at some point before the HDFS API call, and it seems a bit weird to store ServerName since ServerName refers to RegionServers and here we really mean DataNode locations.

      • leases

        protected Leases leases

      • createClusterConnection

        protected ClusterConnection createClusterConnection()
                                             throws IOException
        Create a 'smarter' Connection, one that is capable of by-passing RPC if the request is to the local server; i.e. a short-circuit Connection. Safe to use going to local or remote server. Create this instance in a method can be intercepted and mocked in tests.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • isOnline

        public boolean isOnline()
        Report the status of the server. A server is online once all the startup is completed (setting up filesystem, starting executorService threads, etc.). This method is designed mostly to be useful in tests.
        返回:
        true if online, false if not.

      • stop

        public void stop(String msg,
                 boolean force,
                 User user)
        Stops the regionserver.
        参数:
        msg - Status message
        force - True if this is a regionserver abort
        user - The user executing the stop request, or null if no user is associated

      • getRSRpcServices

        public RSRpcServices getRSRpcServices()

      • abort

        public void abort(String reason,
                  Throwable cause)
        Cause the server to exit without closing the regions it is serving, the log it is using and without notifying the master. Used unit testing and on catastrophic events such as HDFS is yanked out from under hbase or we OOME.
        指定者:
        abort 在接口中 Abortable
        参数:
        reason - the reason we are aborting
        cause - the exception that caused the abort, or null

      • abort

        public void abort(String reason)
        另请参阅:
        abort(String, Throwable)

      • isAborted

        public boolean isAborted()
        从接口复制的说明: Abortable

        指定者:
        isAborted 在接口中 Abortable
        返回:
        true if the server or client was aborted, false otherwise

      • createRegionServerStatusStub

        protected ServerName createRegionServerStatusStub()
        Get the current master from ZooKeeper and open the RPC connection to it. To get a fresh connection, the current rssStub must be null. Method will block until a master is available. You can break from this block by requesting the server stop.
        返回:
        master + port, or null if server has been stopped

      • createRegionServerStatusStub

        protected ServerName createRegionServerStatusStub(boolean refresh)
        Get the current master from ZooKeeper and open the RPC connection to it. To get a fresh connection, the current rssStub must be null. Method will block until a master is available. You can break from this block by requesting the server stop.
        参数:
        refresh - If true then master address will be read from ZK, otherwise use cached data
        返回:
        master + port, or null if server has been stopped

      • getRegions

        public List<HRegion> getRegions(TableName tableName)
        Gets the online regions of the specified table. This method looks at the in-memory onlineRegions. It does not go to hbase:meta. Only returns online regions. If a region on this table has been closed during a disable, etc., it will not be included in the returned list. So, the returned list may not necessarily be ALL regions in this table, its all the ONLINE regions in the table.
        指定者:
        getRegions 在接口中 OnlineRegions
        参数:
        tableName -
        返回:
        Online regions from tableName

      • getRegionServerCoprocessors

        public String[] getRegionServerCoprocessors()

      • closeRegion

        protected boolean closeRegion(String encodedName,
                              boolean abort,
                              ServerName sn)
                       throws NotServingRegionException
        Close asynchronously a region, can be called from the master or internally by the regionserver when stopping. If called from the master, the region will update the znode status.

        If an opening was in progress, this method will cancel it, but will not start a new close. The coprocessors are not called in this case. A NotServingRegionException exception is thrown.

        If a close was in progress, this new request will be ignored, and an exception thrown.

        参数:
        encodedName - Region to close
        abort - True if we are aborting
        返回:
        True if closed a region.
        抛出:
        NotServingRegionException - if the region is not online

      • closeAndOfflineRegionForSplitOrMerge

        protected boolean closeAndOfflineRegionForSplitOrMerge(List<String> regionEncodedName)
                                                throws IOException
        Close and offline the region for split or merge
        参数:
        regionEncodedName - the name of the region(s) to close
        返回:
        true if closed the region successfully.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getCompactionPressure

        public double getCompactionPressure()
        指定者:
        getCompactionPressure 在接口中 RegionServerServices
        返回:
        the max compaction pressure of all stores on this regionserver. The value should be greater than or equal to 0.0, and any value greater than 1.0 means we enter the emergency state that some stores have too many store files.
        另请参阅:
        Store.getCompactionPressure()

      • getFlushPressure

        public double getFlushPressure()
        指定者:
        getFlushPressure 在接口中 RegionServerServices
        返回:
        the flush pressure of all stores on this regionserver. The value should be greater than or equal to 0.0, and any value greater than 1.0 means we enter the emergency state that global memstore size already exceeds lower limit.

      • unassign

        public void unassign(byte[] regionName)
              throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: RegionServerServices
        Unassign the given region from the current regionserver and assign it randomly. Could still be assigned to us. This is used to solve some tough problems for which you need to reset the state of a region. For example, if you hit FileNotFound exception and want to refresh the store file list.

        See HBASE-17712 for more details.

        指定者:
        unassign 在接口中 RegionServerServices
        抛出:
        IOException
